**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) - TSPS 2.3 Business Consultants**

**Publication Date:** September 18, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** October 3, 2023 14:00:00

**Contracting Entity:** Natural Resources Canada

**Description:**

This Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) invites qualified contractors to provide Senior Business Consultants for Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) under the TSPS Supply Arrangement method of supply. The contractor will be required to provide resources at the senior level on an "as and when requested" basis through the issuance of Task Authorizations.

**Scope of Work:**

The scope of work includes providing Senior Business Consultants with expertise in business management and administration. The contractors will be required to propose a resource to satisfy specific task requirements, which will be assessed against the criteria identified in the Resource Assessment Criteria (Appendix 1 to Annex A).

**Key Requirements:**

* The contractor will be required to provide two (2) Senior Business Consultants for the initial contract period.
* Additional resources will be assessed only after contract award and specific task requirements have been verified.
* The contractor will be required to follow the Task Authorization process outlined in Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses.

**Procurement Method:**

This procurement will follow the Competitive - Selective Tendering method.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The selection of the contractor will be based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

**Contract Period:**

The initial contract period is expected to be one (1) year, with three (3) irrevocable option periods allowing Canada to extend the term of the contract up to a maximum of four years.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact:

Raymond Thai
Tendering Authority
Natural Resources Canada
(343) 543-7427
raymond.thai@nrcan-rncan.gc.ca

This notice is available for download from the Canada Buys website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/…
